title: Universal conductance fluctuations in mesoscopic normal-superconducting structures.
abstract: We consider the modification of universal conductance fluctuations (UCF) due to the presence of the superconducting proximity effect. As a novel result, we find that the magnitude of fluctuations depends on the symmetry of the superconducting order parameter
